answers.author: Maxwell Moline
answers.text:
Hello Paul,
I’m sorry you have not received timely responses to your questions in the Knowledge Network in the past. Marking the question as time sensitive, as you have with this question, is a great way to get quicker responses.
A perfect resource to help with your research is the results of ICMA’s annual salary survey. Details about how to subscribe to the survey are here: 
http://icma.org/en/Page/559/Salary_Information
The Knowledge Network has a great deal of premium content available to members. Another benefit of membership is that it will give you access to a network of other members that are eager to answer fellow members’ questions.
I hope this helps with your question. Please let us know if we can be of any more help.
Max Moline
Knowledge Network Intern
ICMA

author: Paul Brown
text:
I need a response to this really fast for some research I'm doing, and things ususally don't get answered quickly on this site, but I figured, why not try?
I'm looking for anyone willing to share their Mayor and City Council's salary information, as well as per diem amounts allowed while traveling for City business, and mileage reimbursements if different from the IRS recommendation.  Any response is appreciated, especially those in the Southeast Region.  Thanks and have a nice day.
Paul J. Brown
Research and Budget Analyst
City of Savannah, GA
title: Elected Officials Salaries and Travel Per Diems
